__e: Draw the spear and javelin against my pursuers.

This is all I've got? I pass their test and then I can spend a couple months, or if I'm really lucky, years, learning from a couple of crazy, half-naked women carrying spears and wearing animal pelts.
Just think of it as the shaft of a spear, and aim your point at the center of your target.
And the Argents will try to put the pike in his hands.
The rest who wanna put a blade through my ribs?
Was that a dream or did I get speared?
